original_title: THE LIMIT OF SLEEPING BEAUTY－リミット・ オブ・スリーピング ビューティ
overview: Aki is an unsuccessful 29-year-old actress who eventually became a magician's assistant. While pretending to be hypnotised on the stage, Aki finds the boundary between reality and illusion becoming increasingly vague. For Aki, the only beautiful memory she has was the time spent with her lover Kaito.
title: The Limit of Sleeping Beauty
